messages.text: (X-Post from <#C767M3VB3|academia>) I was suggested by <@U8JP5B9T2> to post this question here. Any insight? Thanks!

attachments.fallback: [January 4th, 2021 1:26 PM] jacobszelko: Hey is anyone here part of OHDSI (Observational Health Data Sciences and Informatics)? I see that there are no software packages built in Julia for the interface - I am trying to figure out if that is by choice or if there is simply a paucity of Julia programmers in this space. Thanks! :juliaheartpulse-dark:
